name: Doctor Strange
description: Former neurosurgeon Stephen Strange becomes the Sorcerer Supreme after a career-ending car accident, mastering the mystic arts to protect reality.

name: Black Panther
description: T'Challa, heir to the throne of Wakanda, becomes the Black Panther, protector of his nation and warrior king.

name: Spider-Man
description: High school student Peter Parker gains spider-like abilities after being bitten by a radioactive spider, becoming the superhero Spider-Man.

name: Captain Marvel
description: Former Air Force pilot Carol Danvers gains cosmic powers and becomes the superhero Captain Marvel, defending Earth against cosmic threats.
